mapper.select: select * from attend where mem_id=#{memId} order by key desc
select * from ( select row_number() over (order by key desc) rnum, A.* from attend A where mem_id=#{memId}) A where rnum between #{startRnum} and #{endRnum}
mapper.insert: insert into attend(key,mem_id,arrive) values( seq_attend_key.nextval, #{ memId }, sysdate )
mapper.update: update attend set leave=sysdate, time=(SELECT trunc(((TRUNC(sysdate, 'MI')-arrive) * 1440)/60 ,2) FROM attend where key=(select max(key) from attend where mem_id=#{ memId})) where key=(select max(key) from attend where mem_id = #{memId} )
mapper.select: select key,to_char(arrive,'YYYYMMDD')lastArrive,time,to_char(arrive,'hh')lastTime from attend where key= ( select max(key) from attend where mem_id=#{memId} ) order by key desc

select d.key,mem_id,arrive,leave,time,d.yyyymm from attend E,(select to_char(arrive,('YYYYMMDD'))yyyymm,key from attend where mem_id=#{memId}) D where E.key(+)=D.key and D.yyyymm like #{yyyymm} order by key
select count(*) from attend where to_char(arrive,'YYYYMMDD') = #{ date }
select A.*,M.name name from attend A, member M where A.mem_id=M.member_id
